author: ak4222
content: <@543900561460822016> we are currently looking into other compression methods for era1, that would allow a standard checksum to work

author: ak4222
content: Are you aware of any compression algos with a spec that will work for normal checksumming?

author: lightclient
content: <@348892132247076864> there is a pregenerated acculator (shared with portal) and pregenerated checksums for fast verification: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/26621#verification
